## MarkConfig.scaleBindings property

Scale binding map to apply for nodes rendered with this mark config.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scaleBindings?: {
        [key: string]: {
            scale: (datum: any) => any;
            accessor?: (datum: any) => string | number;
        };
    };
```
